title: Alembic configuration and environment
description: Create `alembic.ini` with script_location = migrations, file_template = %%(year)d%%(month).2d%%(day).2d_%%(hour).2d%%(minute).2d_%%(rev)s_%%(slug)s. Create `migrations/env.py` using async Alembic template: import engine from app.db.engine, import all models from app.models, set target_metadata = Base.metadata, implement run_async_migrations() with async engine context, register pgvector extension in context.configure(). Create `migrations/script.py.mako` template. Create empty `migrations/versions/` directory.
acceptance_criteria:
- `alembic.ini` configured with migrations/ location
- `migrations/env.py` uses async engine
- target_metadata points to Base.metadata
- pgvector extension registered
- `migrations/script.py.mako` exists
- `migrations/versions/` directory exists
